freenet.node
Class Location

java.lang.Object
  freenet.node.Location

public class Location
extends Object

Author:
amphibian Location of a node in the keyspace. ~= specialization. Simply a number from 0.0 to 1.0.

getLocation

public static double getLocation(String init)

distance

public static double distance(double a,
                              double b)
Distance between two locations. Both parameters must be in [0.0, 1.0].

distance

public static double distance(double a,
                              double b,
                              boolean allowCrazy)

change

public static double change(double from,
                            double to)
Patterned after distance( double, double ), but also retuns the direction of the change (positive/negative). When given two values on opposite ends of the keyspace, it will return +0.5

normalize

public static double normalize(double rough)
Given an arbitrary double (not bound to [0.0, 1.0]) return the normalized double [0.0, 1.0] which would result in simple wrapping/overflowing. e.g. normalize(1.0+0.5)==0.5, normalize(0.5-1.0)==0.5, normalize({0.0,1.0})=={0.0,1.0}

equals

public static boolean equals(double newLoc,
                             double currentLocation)
